programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep35
programme.desc: The Senses Badge - Roly has lost his best potato but Duggee finds it using his sense of smell.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep34
programme.desc: The Comic Badge - Duggee is reading the Squirrels one of his favourite comics.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep46
programme.desc: Mission Manatee, USA - The Go Jetters are in the Gulf of Mexico to learn about Manatees, peaceful water mammals that spend most of their time either sleeping or eating sea-grass.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep45
programme.desc: Endangered Species, So Paulo, Brazil - The Go Jetters are upset after hearing of the species that need help. Ubercorn tries to cheer them up by planning a visit to the forests of Sao Paulo.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep11
programme.desc: Thomas in Charge - The Island inspector pays a visit to Sodor; when Thomas attempts to impress him, his plans lead to chaos.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Auto Cat - Duck has some competition for Sarah's attention when a brand new toy arrives.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Twang Ball - Scarf Lady introduces Sarah and Duck to a new game involving knitted sporting equipment.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Blown Away - It's too windy for umbrellas and hats but not too windy for Nelly and Nora.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Dog Loves Diggers - Dog and Pug are on a building site and they meet three Diggers - Big Digger, Bigger Digger and Tiny. The two big diggers look down on Tiny but she is the one who wants to do all the work.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep66
programme.desc: Know It All - Monty and his best friend pet pig Jimmy Jones dance and sing to a song about creatures who seem to know it all.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep27
programme.desc: It's Time to go Beach Combing - When JoJo and Gran Gran visit the beach, JoJo is surprised to find the sea is much further away as the tide is out. Together, they see what interesting things they can find.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep24
programme.desc: One Step at a Time - A Po lives in a house on a hill where the view is so incredible it takes his breath away. Unfortunately, the journey up to the house takes his breath away too.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Thinking Outside the Boxes - When a Delivery Po has too many boxes to deliver, the team have to think of a clever way of fitting them into her truck.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hammerbarn - On a trip to Hammerbarn, Bluey and Bingo create their own mini-homes side-by-side in the trolley. But Bluey quickly gets jealous of her neighbour, Bingo.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep33
programme.desc: The Babysitting Badge - King Tiger is called in to look after the Squirrels, as he has a Babysitting Badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep31
programme.desc: The A Cappella Badge - The Squirrels are inspired to learn how to sing a cappella style.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep30
programme.desc: The Topiary Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee practicing his impressive Topiary skills and are keen to try it.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep44
programme.desc: Cave Train Trouble, Slovenia - Glitch has taken Tala on holiday to Slovenia's Postojna Caves, and she is looking forward to finding a rare creature called an olm for her class project. Ubercorn and Lars join them.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Carrot the Champion - A sporty Brussel Sprout, who's training Carrot to do the Ultimate Flip Kick, is Evil Pea in disguise. Evil Pea captures Supertato, but Carrot finally masters the flip kick and rescues him.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Wonder Pea - Supertato is delighted when Evil Pea becomes his sidekick but it's all a trick and Evil Pea captures him! Evil Pea is forced to do a good deed because one of the Cobs needs help.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep95
programme.desc: Tiddlytubby Party - Tinky Winky finds a party invitation and shows it to Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. The invitation takes flight and the Teletubbies follow it to find a Tiddlytubbies' party.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Kite - Dee encourages a friend to say 'kite' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a flying kite, a roaring kite, a dragon kite and even a snoring kite!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Zip's Magnificent Memory Book - The friends go to the waterfall to see a rainbow.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Spidermessy - Messy goes to OKIDO and helps his friends mend Loopy Bridge, but Zim finds himself in a sticky situation along the way!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep67
programme.desc: Surprising Stan - Monty wonders whether it is okay to give away surprises when his mother starts to plan a special treat for Stan.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Magic Xylophone - As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep14
programme.desc: The Train Badge - Duggee is playing with a train set and the squirrels are curious about it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep13
programme.desc: The Dancing Bug Badge - When a dancing bug lands on Duggee's head, he can't stop dancing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Teamwork Badge - A big box is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are very excited.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep48
programme.desc: Puffin Patrol, Iceland - The Westman Islands are home to one of the largest colonies of puffins in the world! Once a year puffins return to the land to lay a single egg.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Symbiosis Shrink Down - The Go Jetters learn about 'symbiosis' - when two different animals or plants help each other.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Easter - It's the night before Easter and Bluey and Bingo are worried the Easter bunny is going to forget about them like last year.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Christmas Swim - The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.desc: Goofy Scoopers / Pat the Dog - SpongeBob and Patrick make it their mission to reunite the recently fires robot band from Goofy Goober's. // Patrick is sent to the pound for acting like a worm, but he won't be able to leave unless SpongeBob can train him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Fortuneteller - Aang, Katara, and Sokka discover a village of people who are all reliant on a fortuneteller in their everyday lives but they are so reliant that they are blind to the immanent danger they are all in.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep311
programme.desc: My Fair Cat Lady - Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep319
programme.desc: The Odd Father / Long Shot - Carlos has to choose Carlitos' Padrino in time for his Christening, but will he make the right call? // Carlota needs a PE credit in order to graduate, so she and Ronnie Anne set out to find the right sport for her.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Flock This Way / Movers and Fakers - Rosa's family activity of birdwatching in the woods goes sour when Sergio gets mistaken for a rare species. // Tired of not having a space of his own, Bobby secretly moves into a vacant apartment unit in the building. Feat. Lori Loud

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Which Witch is Which? / Get Off My Lawnie - Bunny's mother visits from the old country. // Granny Tentacles gets her own spin-off show.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep262
programme.desc: A Cabin in the Kelp / The Hankering - The Gal Pals take Pearl to a cabin in the woods for a weekend of silly pranks. // Mr. Krabs has a secret taste for something surprising.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Insecurity Guards - SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Hats Off to Space / In A Nut's Shell - The Dinghies travel to outer space. // After discovering his empty shell, Narlene and Nobby disguise themselves at Camp Master Krabs.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Present Danger / Stressed for the Part - Dressed as David Steele, Lincoln is on the hunt for his stolen birthday present before it's destroyed. // After landing a role in a Dairyland production, Luan must hide this news from Mrs. Bernardo, who she beat out.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Flip This Flip / Haunted House Call - The Loud kids help Flip clean up his image to impress his middle school crush. // When the Mortician's Club can't afford tickets to Casket Con, they decide to start a business to raise money.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Taunting Hour / Musical Chairs - After Lincoln tries to help Lynn get over a heckler at her soccer game, the Louds realize they all have critics. // Lincoln convinces his teacher, Mr. Bolhofner, to join the Doo-Dads in order to get a better seat in class.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Sitting Bull / The Spies Who Love Me - The older sisters reluctantly let Lynn into their babysitting club but she quickly proves to be too aggressive. // Ronnie Anne wants to go downtown. But her grandparents think it's too dangerous, so they decide to spy on her.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: The Krusty Slammer / Pineapple RV - Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into a jailhouse after Plankton breaks the law, but crime only pays for so long. // SpongeBob and Patrick turn the pineapple into a mobile home to take Squidward on the road trip he deserves.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248
programme.desc: The Krusty Bucket - Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs, but neither restaurant is safe from the newcomer.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep238
programme.desc: Appointment TV / Karen's Virus - The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Bato of the Water Tribe - Aang feels insecure when Katara and Sokka come across something that reminds them of home. Because Aang thinks his friends might leave him, he hides an important message which only leads to trouble.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep606
programme.desc: A Bug's Strife / All the Rage - Dad tears the house apart trying to find the cricket ruining his peaceful day alone in the house. // Tired of getting pummeled during dodgeball, Lincoln and the gang use Clyde's untapped rage without him knowing.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash / Sofa, So Good - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. // The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep251
programme.desc: Shell Games / Senior Discount - Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. // Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep177
programme.desc: The Good Krabby Name - Mr. Krabs wants all of Bikini Bottom to eat at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob and Patrick go on an advertising blitz.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep211
programme.desc: A Tigress Tale - When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace desides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Master and the Panda - When Po's friend Peng returns to the Valley of Peace, everyone is excited...except for Po. What no one else knows is that Peng is actually evil Tai Lung's nephew. Now Po has to admit to powerful Peng that he is the one who skadooshed his uncle.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Present Tense - As the annual Winter Festival approaches, Po doesn't have enough money to buy his dad the present he deserves, so he takes a job as a bounty hunter to capture a dangerous escaped convict for the reward. But Po's plan doesn't go as smooth as he hoped.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep307
programme.desc: King Me - King Julien's archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Best Laid Plaintains / P.E.L.T. - It's a special day when Bada and Bing get a shipment of delicious plantains to eat. Although they jealously guard the African bananas, King Julien's determined to taste them too. // Skipper's losing it. He has to prove he can still lead the squad.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Operation: Swap-anzee / Snowmageddon - The Space Agency sends Private to the moon. His ticket is downgraded to one-way and the other birds can't monkey around if they hope to get him home again. // Snowmageddon hits and traps Skipper and Marlene in the convenience store with X.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep313
programme.desc: The Firebending Masters - Aang is ready to start his firebending training. However, as Zuko attempts to teach him, he realizes he has lost all his firebending power.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Boiling Rock Part 1 - Sokka and Zuko break into The Boiling Rock Prison, the Fire Nation's highest security prison, to rescue Hakoda. When they develope an escape plan after finding Hakoda not there, other prisoners get involved and ruin it.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep315
programme.desc: The Boiling Rock Part 2 - This episode is continuing the jailbreak from the previous episode. Sokka, Hakoda, Zuko and Suki form a new escape plan, but it is complicated by the arrival of Princess Azula.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep123
programme.desc: That Sinkhole Feeling / Like a Brother - Best and Bester get too carried away when tasked with commercializing Bettervale's most beguiling natural wonder. // Diamondo is used to getting everything he wants, and decides what he wants is a sibling, just like Best and Bester.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Funny Money / Shaking Bad - When Best breaks the last clean plate, rather than do the dishes, Best and Bester head out to buy a brand new one. // Best and Bester decide to make the best milkshake ever, only to find themselves in a bitter contest with Flip Flop.

programme.title: Planet Sheen S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Sheen for a Day / Well Bread Man - Sheen helps The Emperor to get the perfect gift for Princess Oom's "Popping Out Day", in order to get his own honor day. // Sheen has to complete the "Manhood Trial by Fire", to take part at a sacred Zeenu-ceremomy.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Just Add Sprinkles / The Write Stuff - Felicity calls a magic, but mischievous, pixie to make her malts delicious. // Felicity's new pen has a way with words, making them a reality.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Rat Pack / Booby Trap - When Keswick's cloning machine ends up in the wrong hands, Petropolis is overrun by Snaptraps! // Bird Brain's discovers that he is the last blue-bottomed booby in Petropolis and thus T.U.F.F. is not allowed to touch him at all.

programme.title: Top Wing S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Chicks On The Loose / Rod's Dream Of Flying - Cheep and Chirp's little cousins just VROOMed off in the Cadet's vehicles. Can Top Wing rescue the chicks and their own rides? // Baddy falls out of his jet while giving Rod a ride. Rod must stay in the air until Swift rescues him.

programme.title: Top Wing S01 Ep110

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC291PoiriervsGaethje2
programme.desc: At UFC 291, the BMF title is up for grabs as Dustin Poirier and Justin Gaethje meet in a highly anticipated rematch. Plus, Alex Pereira makes his light heavyweight debut against Poland's Jan Blachowicz. See those fights and more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep1
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep13
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Blanchfield vs. Fiorot
programme.desc: Prelims - A flyweight title shot may be on the line at Atlantic Citys Boardwalk Hall on March 30 when New Jerseys own Erin Cold Blooded Blanchfield faces French sensation Manon Fiorot in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night. With a combined UFC record of 12-0, Blanchfield and Fiorot have been on a tear at 125 pounds, and with one more win in AC, a crack at the crown is expected to be next. Plus, Westwood native Vicente Luque continues on his quest to rule the welterweights when he battles highlight reel king Joaquin Buckley in what promises to be a memorable co-main event

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Ribas vs. Namajunas
programme.desc: Prelims - A top ten contender in two weight classes, dynamic Brazilian star Amanda Ribas will make her case for a move into the flyweight title conversation when she competes in her first UFC main event against former world champion Rose Namajunas at the APEX in Las Vegas on March 24. Fresh from a Performance of the Night knockout of Luana Pinheiro, Ribas is ready for the biggest fight of her career against Namajunas, a world champion at 115 pounds now seeking gold in the flyweight division
